Pepe Unchained

Pepe is one of the most classic internet memes. I believe it became so popular because sad pepe emotes sadness so clearly. Feels bad man

Over time people created so many variations of sad pepe that when a new one came around, it got dubbed a “rare pepe.” Replace rare with scarce and you can start to see why Pepe on the blockchain makes sense.

I learned about rarepepes the digital trading card and followed Fred’s instructions to get my own.

May 25, 2017
